title: Shatterproof Bond Series Boxset
description: Now available in a handy, cost effective box set, the Shatterproof Bond series will clutch at your heart and leave you aching for more. Come along on a thrlling, adventure with Scotsman Declan Ramsay and Englishman Sam Aiken featuring soaring M/M romance, love, laughter and sizzling lovemaking . Sam and Declan meet at their siblings Scottish castle wedding during novel # 1 "As You Wish". The couple's relationship deepens in novel #2 "Illuminate the Shadows"and as they get to know one another the true nature of the Aiken family business is revealed. Novel #3 "Return to Zero" see's Sam and Declan up to their necks in trouble in the Scottish Highlands, and Declan has to dig deep to save the man he loves.
author: Isobel Starling
